parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>MP Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Event Handlers </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Removes mission event handler added by [[addMissionEventHandler]]. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[removeMissionEventHandler]] [type, index] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> type: [[String]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> index: [[Number]] - Index is returned by addMissionEventHandler. </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _eventHandlerId = [[addMissionEventHandler]] ["Ended", { [[diag_log]] "mission complete"; }];
<template lineStart="1"><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>...</value></part></template>
[[removeMissionEventHandler]] ["Ended", _eventHandlerId];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[for]] "_i" [[from]] 0 [[to]] 4 [[do]] {
	[[missionNamespace]] [[setVariable]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[format]] ["handler%1",_i], [[addMissionEventHandler]] ["Loaded","hint ""_i"";"]];
};
[[removeMissionEventHandler]] ["Loaded", handler2]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Remove the third index under type "Loaded"</value></part></template></code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[addMissionEventHandler]], [[removeAllMissionEventHandlers]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>



<h3 style='display:none'>Notes</h3>
<dl class='command_description'>
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on August 6, 2015 - 22:02 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:SilentSpike|SilentSpike]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
As of Arma 3 version 1.38 you can safely remove mission event handlers without worrying about decrementing higher indices.<br>
'''EDIT:''' this command used to decrement other EH ids above the deleted one (e.g EH 0,1,2,3, delete EH 1, EH would be 0,1,2 now and not 0,2,3) - [[User:Lou Montana|Lou Montana]] ([[User talk:Lou Montana|talk]]) 19:29, 25 June 2020 (CEST)
</dd>

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
